pages.text: $(li)Netherite Scrap is a hard material that can be Smelted in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This material can be found rarely in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/netherite_ingot)Netherite Ingots$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)
